Html:
I have an electric keyboard connected to the microphone jack on my computer.  I can easily record music that I play using NAudio.  However, I'm trying to create a very basic app that tells me which key was pressed on the electric keyboard.  Only one key is pressed at any one time and no special synthesizer settings are used.  Can someone point me in the right direction, or am I using the wrong tool?

One other thing, I am not using a MIDI keyboard.  Also (perhaps to make things easier), each key is pressed for exactly one second, and only 7 keys are used (i.e. Do Re Mi Fa So La Ti).

Never mind. I found this discussion, which pointed me in the right direction:

http://naudio.codeplex.com/discussions/248511
